name: Infected Collapse
description:
This is Infected Collapse. The first game that I made in Unity.

The objective of the game is to survive and see how many kills you have when you die. Survive longer by buying and obtaining new weapons, get more ammo, and shoot zombies constantly. 

Notes

  • The game is in alpha, expect it to have more features in the future
  • This is my first game. If the game has any bugs, I may not be able to fix it because i am still a beginner at this stuff 

Version is alpha 0.1

Hope you like it!
